hero.title: Personalized learning paths, created by AI for you.
hero.subtitle: Nanshe transforms any subject into an interactive learning adventure. Whether you want to learn Japanese, philosophy or coding, we create a personalized roadmap to guide you from beginner to expert.

steps.title: Choose your Capsule
steps.desc: A capsule is your learning universe for a given subject.
steps.details: Whether it's a language, science or creative skill, each capsule contains everything you need to master the field.

steps.title: Follow your Personalized Roadmap
steps.desc: No more guessing what to learn next.
steps.details: For each capsule, we generate a clear and gamified roadmap with specific goals and rewards to unlock.

steps.title: Learn through Interactive Atoms
steps.desc: Each lesson is broken down into small learning units.
steps.details: Instead of long texts, you learn with concise lessons, quizzes and practical exercises.

items.title: Never wonder "where to start?" again
items.text: Our AI analyzes your goal and builds a structured roadmap. You always know where you are and what's next.

items.title: Active learning, not passive
items.text: You're not just a reader, you're an actor: quizzes, dialogues, and immediate practice.

items.title: Gamified to stay motivated
items.text: Clear objectives, XP to earn and rewards to unlock. Feel the satisfaction of progress.

capsules.subtitle: Each capsule is a complete learning universe

cta.subtitle: Join thousands of learners progressing every day with AI
